price: ហើយពួកគេនឹងសួរអ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)អំពីហ្ស៊ុលករណៃ។ ចូរអ្នកពោលថាៈ ខ្ញុំនឹងនិទានរឿងរបស់គេប្រាប់ពួកអ្នក។
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
